law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 29, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 318, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 90, July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 37, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, secs. 24(16), 28. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 275. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. X, sec. 10. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 42. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 1.
